location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Government of India, Army Department, General Staff Branch: Index to Summaries of Intelligence from Headquarters British Forces In Iraq, Nos. 452-464 (Serial No 18)'

physicalDescription.extent: The foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 9; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The volume, marked as secret, is an index to Summaries of Intelligence from Headquarters British Forces in Iraq, numbers 452 to 464. The index consists of subjects arranged in alphabetical order.
